name: Amanda Patrick
text: still waiting on my lawn mower to be delivered by this company. They called me on Monday, no fault of the driver, to let me know that when it was loaded they didn't put it on a pallet and the driver had no way to unload it, he stated he had reached out to the terminal with no response. Since, he didnt' want to mess up my lawn mower, he asked me if I could call the reschedule the delivery. When I called, I got a gentleman who said well who forgot to put a pallet under it, sir idk, I don't work for you guys. He said you don't have a man at home that can just take it off off the truck, I said no sir, don't know any man strong enough to unload a  zero turn lawn mower in a crate by himself. He goes and you don't have a fork lift, again no sir, don't have one of those lying around either. He goes well guess I don't have a choice but to bring it back in and put a pallet under it, this is just rediculous. I am sorry to be a bother, but it is now day two of it suppose to be delivered and I still have no lawn mower and no contact from this company. I had to pay freight and they wanted me to do the work to unload their mistake. I called the company and was advised that my lawn mower was sitting waiting to be re loaded, but they couldn't tell me when this might happen or when it would be delivered. I don't want a phone call from this company to just give me more excuses or ask me if I could that fork lift or hulk of a man to do their job. I just want my lawn mower and then I will make sure to NOT ever have to deal with this company again. Learn some customer service and don't get mad when you guys don't do your job.

resp.text: Amanda, we are sorry to hear you are frustrated with us. We would like to follow up with you; however, we will need a few more details in order to investigate your concerns. We invite you to provide more information on our R+L Cares forum, specifically designed to bring issues to our leadership teams for immediate review. Visit us at https://rlc.com/contact/rl-cares with your PRO (tracking) number for assistance.

They refuse to make it right even though they had delivered the item within 15 minutes of me calling. Blamed everything on a new hire instead of keeping their word and honoring their commitment

resp.text: Karen, we apologize for your recent experience and would like to help, but we need more details regarding your concerns. text: So far it's seems like a great place to work. Most of the employees I've met are friendly and helpful. Management is easy to work with/ for.

text: Very friendly people 😁😄

name: Sue Boyd
text:
Salon Centric is alive and doing well! They are NOT closed but located in the back side of the building! When you pull in just drive around to the back side, you'll see glass doors with a security guard who will direct you to the receiving door (2 doors down in the yard, or just go to the receiving door) where you'll check in. While the sign posted on the receiving door says by appt only, they will do their best to work you in. They have 2 bathrooms inside but no vending machines.
I did mention about their website showing "Permanently Closed" we'll see how long before it gets corrected. Again, they are OPEN! not closed!!

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Worst place in the world to deliver or pick up.  They don't have a driver window that's staffed. You have to stand there and hope someone walks by or turns in your direction. Unorganized, slow, place with a whole bunch of rules that are meaningless and slow things down. Most truckers know what type of place I'm talking about. Make sure you have what you need before you go in, ie, food smokes, ect. You will be there awhile. They do have plenty of room to to park and sleep if you're waiting on an appointment.  There is a Flying J with a Denny's right by the interstate.

name: PlayGirl Hill
text: Love it wonderful place to work great managers and workers

name: Billy Channell
text: They were very nice and helpful. I got held up at the place where I unloaded and was late for my appointment. They understood and still unloaded me.

name: Steve B
text: I used to work at this company and they don't look out for the small people! It's around a few other warehouses and they all start out at over 2 dollars more an hour than Salon Centric! I worked at the place for about 4 years and the only pay increase I got was 17 cents and that was one of the biggest that year. After that the company said it didn't have the money for pay increases, but bought all new forklifts (5)! They also still had the big sales awards that year with all the big prizes (cars leases & trips)! The little people that make the company work didn't see a thing, not even a raise in pay!

text: I love my job that I  am training. PPG has a great work environment and treat you like you been there for years. It is a great company to work for. The supervisors are awesome. Preferred precision group treats you like your part of the family. I recommend you give them a try.

name: Jamaris Snipes
text: This is hands down the best company I’ve ever worked for. The management is very professional and friendly. They thoroughly train you and set you up for work success and life success. This company doesn’t show favoritism and treats everyone equal. PPG is also very considerate of your personal life as well. They understand that things happen. PPG also promotes from within and they give you the opportunity to grow. The sky is the limit with this company. I’ve never seen a company where the CEO is willing to take your call for any of your needs. He’s very professional and understanding. I love this company and I don’t see myself leaving. I’m thankful for all of the opportunity this company has given me. I highly recommend!

Best place to work!!

A company always trying to outstand and be on the top of his field! Great family!

text:
For the time I've been here i noticed how professional this company is. From CEO to Management to employees - you are treated like you've worked there for years! Everyone is so kind and willing to help - even after hours :)
I am proud to be part of the team. I highly recommend PPG as you next career adventure!

name: Katt Kiener
text: I absolutely love my job at PPG Alec is the best manager I have ever had. I have an amazing team that works hard everyday and everyone helps each other out. The work environment is one of the best I have been in. The opportunity for advancement is there if you have the drive and ambition for it. I would 10/10 recommend this place.

name: mary Meyer
text: I only work here for a few days and already fell like I belong. Make sure you are good three to four times a day. Great pay. Great hours.

name: HR Solutions
text: I have been employed with preferred precision Group for a little over 2 months now, I can say that this is one of the best company's. I have learned so much and continue to learn everyday! I am happy to say I work for PPG. If you are looking to work for one of the best company's around. Come join our Team!! Victoria Burdick

name: Toastilicious FrenchToast
text: Hourly workers laid of for salary workers. Haha, hurray for unpaid mandatory overtime! Find a job at an honest company.

name: Penny Finn
text: As an employee of Preferred Precision Group for over a year, I would recommend this company to anyone seeking a career & not only a job. Everyone within the company from CEO to inspectors are always eager to help or assist in any way they can, unfortunately not like some companies I have experienced.  This company does treat you like family/friend while maintaining professionalism & integrity, however that isn't for everyone. As for myself & many others we are proud to be part of a company that builds you up with every opportunity to succeed.

name: Michael Collins
text: I was let go after two days of working because in the managers words, “I didn’t show drive.” It was hard to show drive when I wasn’t given proper instructions, equipment, or anything to do with my job. Instead of giving direction and getting the job done, the manager was busy snap chatting her boyfriend or something else. We would finally start talking about the work, and then the conversation would quickly turn to unrelated topics. They are very unprofessional and two faced. Don’t trust sales. She will be the sweetest thing to your face, but when you walk away, she won’t be as nice. The whole time I was constantly told I was great, and out of nowhere they let me go. I wish I new all of this before I even got the job. Save yourself a headache, and don’t apply. They are only looking for bodies to fill spaces. I was also never told how much I would be making or any company policies.

name: Schy Pitts
text: This company started out great but there is no way to get ahead unless you get into the cliche of the supervisor she makes like rough if you don't go along with what she says. The best supervisor this company has had was fired all because of lies told on her, when in fact she wasn't the problem she tried to fix the problems and worked harder than anyone else, it's sad that management sends in young kids as managers and they jump the gun and get rid of who makes this company and keeps the ones that make it look bad. Supervisor snorting cocaine and leaving to meet truck drivers always belittling others to make herself shine and paying employees for hours they didn't even work she is the one who should of lost her job instead of the one that cared about the employees and tried to follow company rules. Don't work for this company unless you like drama cause that's all you going to get here

name: Chasity Johnson
text: As an employee for about 7 months now I would recommend working for Preferred Precision Group to anyone. They are an amazing Company to work for. Very respectful people and you can learn so much from them. They make you feel like family

name: CM YG
text: I have only worked for Preferred Precision Group for a short time, but I would highly recommend the company to potential candidates and customers.  It is a very family oriented company who values their employees and strives for perfection with the services they provide to their customers.  The CEO and executive management are highly engaged and passionate and the company offers endless possibilities for advancement and growth in a entrepreneurial environment.

name: Tyler Scott
text: Working in upper management throughout Preferred Precision Group has been beneficial in several different aspects. The managers and execs within the company are more than passionate & enthusiastic about the employees and clients that we support. The structure, great deal of trust, and creative freedom that has been bestowed amongst me from my employer has paved the path to success for myself and co-workers. Since my journey began at PPG I have seen numerous colleagues’ transition into different titles, receive promotions, and add value to our company. The extra mile our CEO takes to maintain happiness amongst the employees is astounding and I would recommend working here to anyone!

name: Sonya Smith
text: I worked for this company and it was great. The CEO is awesome he will stand by his employees all the way. Management is different than what I'm use to but any new job takes getting use to I suppose . Pay is great and if you can BE ON TIME DO YOUR JOB NO DRAMA SPEAK UP WHEN NEEDED YOU WILL DO GREAT AND IT WILL BE NOTICE. There's always room to be promoted with this group.

name: Terence Sinkfield
text: I have never been part of a company with so much moral support and professionalism! I started off as an associate and have worked my way up. I was giving all the tools necessary for me to reach my full potential. PPG really changed my life and made me a better person in and outside of work. For that I'm eternally grateful. The upper management showed me the passion and support of my own family.  If you're looking for a company that will give you a platform to reach your highest potential then PPG offers the opportunity. And recipe for success..

name: Truth B
text: Absolutely don’t recommend. Worked for the company and did my job. It’s your word against hear say with this company. The CEO gets rid of the people who cares about the company but keep the ones who secretly sabotage PPG. The only knowledge I’ve gained from this company is how many people sleeps with each other in upper management. I guess you have to be a blonde and be willing to lay down to get recognition or keep a job at PPG. A major thumbs down.

name: Tiffany White
text: This is by far one of the most unique companies I have ever worked for. The CEO of the company is very hands on. He believes in his associates and will go to bat for all of his employees at any cost. Once hired into this company, you are made to feel like you are family. Most of the associates are contractors, but you never feel that way. The people who lose their jobs are people who truly don't want to work. If you come to work everyday and are not full of drama, you will find a good paying job that will last a long time.

name: Jacob Neel
text: PPG upper management provides associates and supervision the tools to succeed in the field. Support is always available to do your job correctly and ensure that everyone in the company can experience growth together. Altogether a very family like atmosphere.

name: Candy Cane
text: I love working for this company!  I am able to work independently, as well as, work with a team of knowledgeable and creative people.  Everyone is extremely dedicated and supportive.

name: Warren Baucom
text: I have worked in Quality Assurance for aerospace 15+ years and this Company is a complete joke.  If you are looking for a job I would recommend that you look elsewhere.  If you are a business looking for a third party quality control company, I would look elsewhere. You would be better off just hiring some people of the streets.

name: Leigh Ricketts
text: I have worked for Preferred Precision Group for over 3 1/2 years and enjoyed the environment and opportunities given.  I have learned many new skills and talents.  PPG is a company where you are constantly challenged to grow and develop.  If you seek a great career where you can make a difference in a manufacturing/ quality environment,  then this is your opportunity!    This Nationwide company is lead by a strong professional executive team that will mold you to the next level. You will truly see a well developed team at work. One team, one goal.

name: Sierra Whitaker
text: While I have been with this company I have always enjoyed my job . Enjoyed the environment I worked in from day one all of the management is very thorough also very persistent with training and helping you to move up in not only the company but in life. I would highly recommend this company to anybody looking to make a career or even a potential customer.

name: Ace Services SWFL
text: Great company!!!

name: Denise Barlow
text: Got an email from jennifer Baker. Called her numerous times, and even sent her an email. She works for day star. Still a week later have not heard a word from her. She does not communicate with anyone. She does need a job not calling back or responding to people's calls or emails.

name: Corey Phillips
text: Within the 2 years I have worked for PPG I have been given opportunity after opportunity to learn and strive inside the company. The professionalism and the way the employees are treated like family makes me proud to be apart of the company.

name: Kenna Reynolds
text: Horriable management!! My fiance and I both worked for this company in Auburn,Al. We both have worplace experience, we showed up on time done our jobs and didnt stand around and waste time however we were reassigned due to the manager Ethel being offended because my fiancecorrected her mistake. He was offered a lead position the day before we were reassigned and then out of nowhere that happened.  I do not recommend working for this co to anyone.

name: jodie parker
text: I'm very thankful to be a part of this team! Would recommend to anyone.

name: Chelsea Phillips
text: Never have I ever been with a company who was so close knit. The CEO is very hands on and involved with every customer PPG has. He engages in each plant daily, to ensure we are providing the best possible opportunities for our employees. Theres always room to move up within the company which in turn makes  you strive for greatness. Your hard work never goes unnoticed. PPG is truly a great place to work.

name: Kirk Evans
text: I was there on business.  PPG is one of my company's customers.  They are friendly people who genuinely care about getting the job done right.

name: Kadaryl Morris
text: My experience with PPG has been nothing more than exciting. If you are looking for a company that offers more opportunities than you can count you have found the right one. Working for PPG allows me to not only travel to new places but it helps me learn more about business everyday. The knowledge and confidence I have gained while working for this company is priceless. My CEO is very hands on and always makes sure I have the tools i need to succeed. I have gotten very close with the people I work with. PPG has become my family.

name: Joe Tays
text: I am currently a supevisor for PPG. I have been a supervisor for about six months now.and it has by far been some of the greatest work experience of my life.

name: Casey McCurry
text: This company sucks! They give you little to no information on a job when hiring you!! They are so unorganized!!! They will fire you for nothing then avoid and ignore your calls when you try to find out why!  This company sucks. Don't work for them!!!!!!

name: Autumn Strickland
text: I was interviewed and drug tested last week. I was told to report back today for a job. I was there on time and the door was locked. I knocked a black male opened the door and would not let me in. I explained him I was there for a job and was told to be here. He said, Sorry we are working on the Chattanooga group and refused to let me inside. How can they tell you you are hired, you show up and no one will let you inside the building. -Erik Strickland

name: Monique Copeland
text: I have been working for PPG since April 2016 since I’ve worked for this company I’ve gained  a significant amount of skills. I started off as an inspector and used my knowledge and skills along with what I’ve gained from PPG and is now a supervisor. PPG is very family oriented and care about all of their employees. I look forward to growing with this company and accomplishing all my goals. So far i have had an outstanding experience with PPG and look forward to many more.

name: Ciara Mccormick
text: I left college to join PPG and I thought it was going to be the scariest most life changing thing I’ve ever had to do. And I was right. But I wouldn’t change it. Since I have been with PPG I’ve learned what the words teamwork, dedication, and hard work actually mean. This company has shaped me into a much stronger person. My CEO only wants the best for all of his associates and genuinely cares about their needs and concerns. Not only does my CEO want me to succeed in my work place but in life too. I’m in Florida the company is in Alabama, I have full bars or service I can clearly tell she is lying. So eventually she hangs up on me. I call back immediately and when the automated answering voice answers to notify the call is being recorded a pause occurs then the automated voice comes back and says we are currently closed. Hmm odd I just called two min prior!! Also company website and google have the company open until 5pm today. This is unsatisfactory, I will be contacting the better business bureau. The way the company rep handled my call and then either blocked my number or changed the auto answer system to show closed was so unprofessional I have never experienced anything like this.

text: Products are good.  Prices are good.  Customer service order process is poor.  I have bought from them at least 15 times.  I have to call in to get a freight quote for my items. Every order I make takes about 20 minutes of waiting on the phone while they ask you the same information I have given them every time.  They all want to contact you again in 1-2 hours with the freight quote, the freight quote is always about the same.  I want  to complete the order now and be done.  All of the customer service reps are sitting in the same area so the background noise is terrible.  I don't know how they make money with one customer service rep tied up on an order for 20 minutes.  If it wasn't for the good prices, I would go somewhere else.

name: Jerud Crandall
text:
My truck runs on waste vegetable oil and i've use Duda Diesel for both equipment (valves, fittings, heat exchangers) and supplies (filter bags). Their prices and selection are excellent, and the online information is very complete (lots of dimensions and specs). Generally i'm happy to do business with them.

But their shipping sucks. I travel, so when i order things online i have it shipped ahead. Twice now i have gotten to my destination, only to find my order's tracking status has been stuck at "pre-shipment information has been sent to USPS" for several days, or a week! When i called (both times), i was told my order had been lost. The first time, Duda sent a replacement order and expedited it for free -- but i was still held up by a day or two and frustrated by the complications. The second time, i was told they would send a replacement and a confirmation email.  After no confirmation, i called back an hour later and was told the same thing.  This time i asked for a different phone number to call.  After yet again getting no confirmation of a replacement order, i called the new phone number, once /again/ got someone who was surprised that my order was lost, and tried again to get the replacement on the way. This finally worked.

Not sure how Duda is making money, "losing" so many orders, but as on online business i'm shocked at the ineptitude of their order fulfillment process and staff. I give 3 stars because their product offering and prices are still good...if you can get them.

name: Jesse Therien

text: This place is perfect for all my storage needs.  I have one unit that is climate controlled and protects my important items that are sensitive to heat/cold and humidity. Then my needs changed and had more items to store and the very friendly office staff was able to find me an outside unit in very short time.  I'm using that for shop and tool storage that can be outside.  The rates for both climate controlled and other storage are the most competitive anywhere around.  I also like the easy access location in Madison, along the BLVD and on a low traffic side street that makes entry and exit with my trailer and truck very stress-free.  Also there is plenty of room in both areas for your truck and trailer access to make loading and unloading a breeze.  This is the 3rd time over the past 7 years I've used this location and HIGHLY recommend checking them out for any needs you have.

name: BRANDY HOLT
text: I am very pleased with U-Lock-It Storage in all aspects. I have had several different storage units over the years and U-Lock-It has been the best hands down. The staff is friendly and helpful all the time, the facility is well kept and maintained, and the lighting inside and outside of my unit is great. The day I went in to see about renting my units, Christy took the time to sit with me and help me figure out just how much space I needed. Yes, most places do that, however, Christy didn't just try and throw specials at me, or get me to spend more money just to have extra space. She did however, get me the best deal for what I needed, then threw in the appropriate discounts! This particular U-Lock-It Storage location is the best! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to store their things!

resp.text: We are absolutely thrilled to hear your experience with us was so wonderful, Brandy. Security and lighting is very important to us and is something we take very seriously, too. We will definitely pass along this message to management. We appreciate your business and taking the time to leave us a 5-star review. Let us know if we can be of more service to you! - Kiera A.

name: Fred Fletcher
text:
Christy Golden, Property Manager at U-Lock-It, genuinely wants to help people. I recently moved my step-daughter down and we were looking for a storage facility. There were some items that we were unsure about storing and Christy gave us her honest and professional opinion regarding the storage of the items, which saved us thousands of dollars; if we had stored them like we planned.  In addition, because of the move, are budget was a little over, so Christy took the time out of her schedule to give us some additional local numbers to check other prices; however, after calling around and comparing the prices,  U-Lock-it had the best prices. Most important, Christy’s customer service, her positive attitude and willingness to assist us on the day before the 4th of July showed that her Family Owned Company was the best for us.
When you’re moving you can be at a vulnerable stage and I have seen some companies take advantage of that; however, Christy at U-Lock-It demonstrated that she cared and treated me and  my step-daughter with nothing but the upmost respect. She actually treated us like family.
I whole-heartedly endorse U-Lock-It for any of your storage needs.
Excellent company
Fred

name: Stacey Smith
text: Be careful using this storage facility. They advertise 24 hour camera monitoring but this is not the case. I was notified by the site manager Krystal on Jan 7 2020, asking why did I pay on a unit that was empty. I explained to her that I was at the unit on Dec 26 2019 storing additional items and paid the rent on Jan 2 2020. On the Jan 7th, I went to the unit and sure enough it was empty with no trace of my items in sight. The unit was clean and ready for someone to move in. My lock was missing and had been replaced with a blue lock by the storage facility's site manager. The police were contacted and after the investigation there was footage of me taking items on Dec 26th 2019 but no footage of my items being taken on or before Jan 7 2020. The items taken included a large 60 inch tv (older style), deep freezer and gas grill to name a few. These are heavy items that would take some time to remove and load up from a climate controlled unit in which you must enter a door to gain access to the unit. I am highly disappointed in how the site manager and owner Karmen treated me during the process. I had to request for the rent to be refunded for Jan 2020 and I received no apologies or follow-ups from either of them after the incident. Store at Your Own Risk!!

resp.text: We strongly apologize for any inconvenience. For more security, we will be adding more Cameras to ensure greater assistance for our tenants and property. Anything we can do to further help your situation please let us know.

text: Bought high-end gas stove online. Just what we wanted and the price was fantastic. They provided extremely well detailed photos of the unit showing the few minor scratches. Extremely helpful customer service who met specific shipping needs for us . Follow up communications were clear and helpful. The range arrived in Seattle when promised. Superbly  packed. No issues and it’s just as expected. We love our new range!

name: Carol Ann
text: I live in SW Florida and recently purchased a Thermador range top from A L Surplus. I ordered this range top on Friday 12/04 and received it today 12/10. Because this was an out-of-state purchase from a vendor I had not previously used I was slightly apprehensive; however, after speaking with David over the phone a few times and reading all of the positive reviews I decided to move forward with the purchase and I'm so glad I did. Not only did I save over $800 (and months of delays due to backorders) by purchasing the previous generation range top (which looks almost exactly like the current generation), the appliance was unbelievably well-packaged not only by Thermador (in its original packaging) but by A L Surplus as well. This was a truly positive experience and a business I would absolutely recommend to others.

name: Barry Grunzke
text: Smooth transaction! High end wall oven delivered to the midwest in 2 days! Amazing. Wrapped with care in perfect condition. David was great to work with and always available. I did my research and would not hesitate to buy from ALSurplus again!

name: Peter Eligh
text:
Firstly, I want to say that we do like the product that we purchased.  I  would agree with a previous reviewer that it is not  the best deal in town and similar products can be found elsewhere for less money.

Mostly my experience is related to communication or lack there of.  We purchased in mid January.  It was a special order re: fabric etc, so we did not receive until  late April.  The order was incomplete ( cushions missing).  Craig was very helpful in re ordering and getting the cushions that were missing.  Following this,  for a variety of reasons we did not get the cushions until  early June.  Within this 5 month period, I received  no phone calls from the store indicating where things were at.  I phoned many times - initially re: sofa and love seat arrival, then later re: the cushions and there arrival.  Even when they did arrive , I was not contacted , but rather found out through yet another of my enquiries.  Once everything was received and picked up , I have tried on numerous occasions to call, text,  and email the manager to discuss this situation and give my feedback, as I think it only fair to complain to the person(s) directly.  To date , I have received no return message in any format. So, for me not the best customer service.

name: Sithis Locks
text:
Yup, stay off the grass. Quick in and out for the most part.

Had a nice chat with the guy in the office there. Good taste in podcasts. Thanks for sharing.

Find any random golf balls, they're his.

name: James Franksain
text:
Easy back but stay off the grass if it's damp. You can see places where it appears someone sunk to the axles and doing that will probably increase your unload time a bit.
Nice folks and relatively quick unload time. Entrance is a touch bumpy so unless you have everything in your truck bungied down tight I'd recommend keeping it around 5-6 mph once you turn off of 114.

name: Nino Brown
text: First time delivering to this place. The entrance is crazy, just follow your phone GPS . It’s gonna take you down a residential narrow road but it’ll lead it right to the place. Slide your tandems if you can, or make sure you make wide turns. The unloading process is very quick.

name: Angel Calles
text: Great place to Pick up. You can show up earlier than your appointment and they will work with you. Open 24hrs to load. Scale is broken! Slide tandems to the rear.  Drop your trailer,  disconnect and pull forward. Slide a Jack stand underneath the front and chock your tires. They will bring your paperwork to you when done. In and Out in about an hour or so.

name: Amie Cain
text:
Was loaded with over 44,000 pounds and hand delivered my paperwork in just under 7 minutes.
That has GOT to be a world record! I didn't know that was even possible!
To all you wannabe shippers around the world, you can learn a lot from this place!

name: Jason Maddox
text: This company is at the bottom of my list to purchase from. Tarping Systems, Inc. does not seem to keep anything in stock. When i place an order i don't want to be lied to with you saying it will be going out this day but then it not leave your location for almost two weeks because you are short 1 item. Just back order the 1 item and send me the rest of my order. I also didn't like the fact that once i get used to a sales representative, then automatically have to talk to a new one like a week later. Plus I don't like that your sales representatives puts me on hold every question i have. Why cant your your team be knowledgeable about the product. It seems like your team needs more in depth training.  And when i asked to speak to a manager they are always in a meeting or never can speak kinda irritating. I will not be suggesting you to any of my friends. Down right horrible experience.

name: Zelalem Assfaw
text:
my name is Zee I bought Tarps from Tarping systems inc. Slocomb, AL. most of there Tarp motor it just working for 2 month after 2 month start loosing from where you mounted because it is not a good metal it is cheap metal. The tarp sewing machine must be very cheap because I purchased 5 Tarps each tarp cost $94.00 each plus shipping within 2 month it just came off from the back side of the Truck why the one they fold and put it together it just coming separated because of there sewing machine is so weak not holding both together. I did use my own Technic but each of them cost me to repair $80/each. I video tape it and make a picture and send them there claim department need send them back to Alabama and they will sew it and return me back I asked them to return the unused tarp they said no I can't return it back.
I just need to tell you Tarping system they are using very cheep material it is not recommend as a good Tarp  salers
